title: AccountsLegend
author: AccountsLegend
created_time: September 05, 2022, 09:55:40 AMLast edit: September 05, 2022, 12:50:41 PM by AccountsLegend
content: Hi mate,I had many accounts and smerits for sale,interested pm .No time waster or spammer or Jokers who try to report my account.My personal telegram Id :Pm @accountsellerlegendImportant announcement:I had verified twitter account and Instagram accounts for sale and normal twitter accounts with high followers Pm @accountsellerlegendTheir will be One sun,One moon,One accounts seller.NO ONE CAN DESTROY ME……

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: Quote from: AccountsLegend on September 05, 2022, 09:55:40 AMNO ONE CAN DESTROY ME……Are you sure it's not possible? To begin with, you should know that you have placed the topic in a board that is not suitable for what you are selling - and if you are not intelligent enough to correctly choose the right board, then in combination with what you are selling, you are a very bad person for any trade.Every account you sell will sooner or later be detected and red tagged -  so, accordingly, it will become completely worthless.

comments.author: Z-tight
comments.body: Hello, i can see you are back in the 'business' of selling accounts and smerits too, i am sure you know account sales and account sellers are not to be trusted and all that, but most importantly, do not come back to complain if another member tricks you by pretending they want to buy an account from you in order to expose the accounts you have for sell, because you will look funny if it happens again, we'll be talking about déjà vu.

comments.author: AccountsLegend
comments.body: Quote from: Lucius on September 05, 2022, 10:11:25 AMQuote from: AccountsLegend on September 05, 2022, 09:55:40 AMNO ONE CAN DESTROY ME……Are you sure it's not possible? To begin with, you should know that you have placed the topic in a board that is not suitable for what you are selling - and if you are not intelligent enough to correctly choose the right board, then in combination with what you are selling, you are a very bad person for any trade.Every account you sell will sooner or later be detected and red tagged -  so, accordingly, it will become completely worthless.Yes,I challenge you.You can try and Update me.Many people scamming buyers with out accounts.But I am doing clean deal.

To begin with, you should know that you have placed the topic in a board that is not suitable for what you are selling - and if you are not intelligent enough to correctly choose the right board, then in combination with what you are selling, you are a very bad person for any trade.Every account you sell will sooner or later be detected and red tagged -  so, accordingly, it will become completely worthless.At one moment, they will probably get into the Reputation board because of "inappropriate" red feedback or they will open ban appeal topics.Quote from: AccountsLegend on September 05, 2022, 10:55:46 AMYes,I challenge you.You can try and Update me.be careful what you wish for, maybe your wish will come true QuoteMany people scamming buyers with out accounts.But I am doing clean deal.Is there any user who can confirm that you are not a scammer and that you behave fairly in the trade?

comments.author: AccountsLegend
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on September 05, 2022, 11:50:06 AMIs there any user who can confirm that you are not a scammer and that you behave fairly in the trade?You want their account to be red trust???

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: Quote from: AccountsLegend on September 05, 2022, 12:08:59 PMYou want their account to be red trust???They will be painted red without you revealing who it is, and for example here is one who might just be your client -> https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5404539.msg60804239#msg60804239You are busted along with your alt accounts -> https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5404539.0
